full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` GRUB CHEN THANG STONG RGYAL PO RDO RJE'I GSUNGS SKYA NAD GROL MAR GRAGS PA'I SMON LAM BYIN RLABS CAN BZHUGS SO, ,
